src.atm.account.Account

    Package Description
    src.atm.account

    • Uses of Account in src.atm.account

      Subclasses of Account in src.atm.account 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AdminAccount
      This class provides special functionality and privileges that allow direct access and control of other bank accounts.
      class  BankAccount
      This class provides methods and functionality for users to have bank accounts that can store their balances and make deposits, withdrawals, or transfers.
      class  SavingsAccount
      This class contains additional functionality to have a bank account that applies interest to every transaction.
      Fields in src.atm.account with type parameters of type Account 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Account> Account.ACCOUNT_MAP
      Provides means of storage and retrieval of accounts based on their account number.
      Methods in src.atm.account that return Account 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Account Account.GET_ACCOUNT​(int accountNumber, java.lang.String accountPin)
      Retrieves an account from the account map with a specified account number.
      Methods in src.atm.account that return types with arguments of type Account
